amendment.description: To set aside funds for the Oklahoma City National Memorial.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1752 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1752 proposed by Senator Burns for Senator Nickles. (consideration: CR S11813-11814) To set aside funds for the Oklahoma City National Memorial.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1752 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1752 proposed by Senator Burns for Senator Nickles.
